Topics with Readings from a couple of books. Note: '''Required book''' is Core Java. Also, Topics will change due to final/midterm being dropped.

1. Introduction to Javas:
      An overview of Course. overview of java and starting syntax.
      Core Java Ch 1 & 2
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - ch 1 & 2
      Thinking in Java 4th ed - introduction,
      Java Tutorial Online - [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/TOC.html] - Object-Oriented Programming Concepts and Language Basics

2. Classes and Objects:
      Broad overview of Java language syntax and constructs.
      Core Java Ch 3 & 4
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - ch 3 4, & 5
      Thinking in Java  4th ed - intr to objects, everything is an object, operators, controlling execution
      Java Tutorial Online - [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/TOC.html] - Classes and Objects

3. Collections of Objects:
      Introduction to arrays and collections.
      Core Java Ch  4
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - ch 6
      Thinking in Java 4th ed - arrays, generics, holding your objects
      Java Tutorial Online -  [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/package/index.html]

4. Library Classes:
      Examination of a few of the most widely used classes and the importance of good documentation in enabling re-use.
      Core Java Ch  4
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - ch 6
      Thinking in Java see week 3
      Java Tutorial Online  - [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/collections/index.html] - Introduction,

5. Class Design:
      Exploration of important elements of class design. Basic design techniques are introduced.

6. Inheritance:
      Discussion:
      Core Java Ch  5
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - ch 7, 8, & 9
      Thinking in Java 4th ed - reusing classes
      Java Tutorial Online -  [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/IandI/index.html] - Interfaces and inheritance

7. Abstraction Techniques:
      The importance of abstract types is explored.
      Core Java Ch  6
      Head First Java 2nd Ed. - see week 6

      Java Tutorial Online - [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/IandI/index.html]

      The Java exception handling mechanism.

      Java Tutorial Online - [http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/index.html] - Exceptions
